Dilip Joshi Age

55 Years Old

Dilip Joshi Net Worth in Rupees is estimated around 37 Crores in Indian Rupees which is equivalent to $5 Million USD. Dilip Joshi gained widespread recognition for his portrayal of Jethalal Gada in the immensely popular comedy show “Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah.”

Dilip Joshi Biography

Dilip Joshi Family

Physical Measurements

Dilip Joshi Career

Dilip Joshi embarked on his acting journey in 1989, debuting as Ramu in the film “Maine Pyar Kiya.” Subsequently, he became a part of various Gujarati dramas, including “Bapu Tame Kamaal Kari,” where he shared the stage with Sumeet Raghavan and Amit Mistry, known for their TV show “Shubh Mangal Savadhan.”

Joshi’s presence extended to shows like “Yeh Duniya Hai Rangeen” and “Kya Baat Hai,” where he portrayed a South Indian character. He also made appearances in films such as “Phir Bhi Dil Hai Hindustani” and “Hum Aapke Hain Koun..!” alongside Salman Khan, Aupam Kher amongst others.

In 2008, Dilip Joshi embarked on a significant role in the popular sitcom “Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah,” portraying the character of Jethalal Champaklal Gada alongwith Disha Vakani, Amit Bhatt, Shailesh Lodha, Munmun Dutta, Neha Mehta, Mandar Chandwadkar, Jennifer Mistry Bansiwal, Kavi Kumar Azad, Bhavya Gandhi, Nidhi Bhanushali, Jheel Mehta, Raj Anadkat, Tanuj Mahashabde, Gurucharan Singh, Sonalika Joshi, Priya Ahuja, Monika Bhadoriya, Kush Shah, Shyam Pathak, Sunayana Fozdar, Samay Shah, Ambika Ranjankar, Palak Sindhwani & Supriya Pathak.

His stellar performance in the show earned him numerous accolades, including 5 Telly Awards and 3 ITA Awards. Among his other Hindi tele-serials are “Kabhi Yeh Kabhi Woh,” “Hum Sab Baarati,” “Hum Sab Ek Hain,” “Shubh Mangal Savadhan,” “Kya Baat Hai,” “Daal Mein Kala,” and “Meri Biwi Wonderful.”

Dilip Joshi also featured in the children’s comedy “Agadam Bagdam Tigdam” as Uncle Tappu and appeared in the 2009 films “Dhoondte Reh Jaaoge” and Ashutosh Gowarikar’s “What’s Your Raashee.”

People Also Ask

Q1. What is Dilip Joshi Net Worth in Rupees ?

Ans. Dilip Joshi Net Worth in Rupees is estimated around 50 Crores in Indian Rupees which is equivalent to $6 Million USD.

Q2. How old is Dilip Joshi ?

Ans. Dilip Joshi was born on 26 May 1968 in Gosa Village, Porbandar, Gujarat, India. As of 2024, he is 54 Years old.
